text: Stuart Glascott (born 6 June 1965) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with the Brisbane Bears in the Victorian Football League (VFL). Glascott, the younger brother of Carlton premiership winner David, was originally from Victoria but joined the Bears from Southport. He appeared in the final four rounds of the 1987 VFL season.AFL Tables: Stuart Glascott ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1965 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Brisbane Bears players Category:Southport Australian Football Club players Category:Living people
title: Stuart Glascott
